editorParams.PARSESCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\")(,\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\")*\}/g,(x, value, icon) => { const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); if (icon) { icon = icon.slice(8).slice(1, -1).trim(); } return controller.parseCommentTag({icon, ...item});}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})
